requestBody: {"input":[{"content":[{"text":"You are a helpful assistant with math and code execution capabilities.","type":"input_text"}],"role":"system"},{"content":[{"type":"input_text","text":"Calculate the square root of 144, then write Python code to find the factorial of 5."}],"role":"user"}],"stream":true,"model":"gpt-5-nano","max_output_tokens":200,"tools":[{"parameters":{"properties":{"expression":{"type":"string","description":"Mathematical expression to evaluate"}},"required":["expression"],"type":"object"},"name":"calculate_math","type":"function","description":"Perform mathematical calculations"},{"container":"auto","type":"code_interpreter"}]}
notes: Function call (math) and code interpreter in streaming mode - this tests the challenging scenario
